A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
OMG\, worst way to reboot a franchise.  Should've been a straight to VHS movie.  Yes I meant straight to VHS since no one uses that format anymore and this would've gone unseen.  

Disney and Rian Johnson should be ashamed.  It's not that it couldn't of been good but has lots of flaws.  

Make the hero the zero?  Jedi don't give up.
Leia can avoid a vacuum death\, and fly? LOL
Throw away the laser sword your dad owned\, that you owned.?  It's a sign of goodness\, not just a weapon.
The strong evil guy\, cut in half?  too easy.
Kylo is a lousy villain with mediocre abilities for the Skywalker lineage.
The force ghosts can now interact with the real world?  Then why didn't Obi Wan\, Qui Gon or dozens of others stop Darth Vader\, Sidious\, or any other bad guys from killing the kids in two separate movies now?  

Good thing I wont have to be excited for IX.  And I'm not even a huge Star Wars fan and I was offended by this travesty.
